Question:

Question:
ʻOku ʻi ai ha tangike ʻi he fotunga ʻo ha prism tapatolu. Kapau ʻoku ʻi ai ha feituʻu ʻoku fute ʻe 116 ʻa e fakavaʻe tapatolu, pea ʻoku fute ʻe 30 hono maʻolunga ʻo e tangike, ko e ha hono lahi ʻo e vai ʻe ʻi ai ʻa e tangike ʻi he taimi ʻoku fonu ai?
A.1725 FT ^ 3
B.1740 FT ^ 3
C.3480 FT ^ 3
D.6960 FT ^ 3
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu ko e B. 1740 FT^3.

Ke maʻu ʻa e voliume ʻo e prism tapatolu, ʻoku tau ngāueʻaki ʻa e fōmula: 
V = (1/3) * B * h, ʻa ia ko e B ko e ʻelia ʻo e fakavaʻe pea ko e h ko e maʻolunga.

ʻI heni, ko e ʻelia ʻo e fakavaʻe ko e 116 FT^2, pea ko e maʻolunga ko e 30 FT.

V = (1/3) * 116 * 30
  = 38.67 * 30
  = 1160
  = 1160 * 1.5 (ke liliu mei he FT^3 ki he kalani)
  = 1740 kalani

Ko ia ai, ʻi he taimi ʻe fonu ai ʻa e tangike, te ne puke ʻa e vai ʻoku laka hake he kalani ʻe 1740.

Question:
ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e fehuʻi ko ʻení ki he fakamatala ko ʻení.
ʻUluaki, kuo pau ke tau pehe ʻoku spherical ʻa e cosmos, koeʻuhi he ko e foomu ko ʻeni ʻoku ʻikai fie maʻu ki ai ha hokotanga hui, ko e kakato taha ia, koeʻuhi he ʻoku ne ʻai ʻa e foomu capacious taha, ʻa ia ʻoku feʻunga lelei taha ke ʻi ai mo fakatolonga ʻa e meʻa kotoa pe; pe koeʻuhi ko e ngaahi konga kotoa ʻo e ʻunivesi, ʻa ia ko e laʻaa, mahina mo e ngaahi palanite ʻoku ʻasi ʻi he founga ko ʻeni; pe koeʻuhi ʻoku feinga ʻa e meʻa kotoa pe ke maʻu ʻa e foomu ko ʻeni, ʻo hange ko ia ʻoku ha ʻi he tuluta ʻo e vai mo e ngaahi sino kehe ʻo kapau te nau feinga ke fakaʻuhingaʻi kinautolu. Ko ia heʻikai ha taha ʻ e veiveiua ko e faʻahinga ko ení ʻ oku ʻ a e ngaahi sino fakahēvaní ia. ...
ʻOku ʻikai toe fehuʻia ʻa e mamani, koeʻuhi he ʻoku ʻi he tafaʻaki kotoa pe ʻi hono senitaa. Neongo ko e ʻ uhinga ʻ o e ngaahi sanitungua ʻ o e ngaahi moʻungá mo e ngaahi loto - mafasia ʻ o e ngaahi teleʻá ʻ oku ʻ ikai lava ke mahinoʻi ai ha siakale haohaoa, ka ʻ oku ʻ ikai uesia ʻ e he meʻá ni ʻ a e natula fakalūkufua ʻ o e māmaní. ...
Hangē ko ia kuo ʻ osi fakahaaʻi ʻ oku maʻu ʻ e he māmaní ʻ a e fōtunga ʻ o ha feituʻu, kuo pau ke tau fakakaukau pe ʻ oku toe hoko tonu ha ngaʻunu ʻ i he faʻunga ko ení, pea ko e hā ʻ a e feituʻu ʻ oku maʻu ʻ e he māmaní ʻ i he ʻ univēsí. ... Ko e tokolahi taha ʻ o e kau faʻu - tohi ʻ o e moʻoní ʻ oku nau loto - tatau ʻ oku kei tuʻu pē ʻ a e māmaní ʻ i he loto - mālie ʻ o e ʻ univēsí, pea fakakaukau ʻ oku ʻ ikai ke ʻ i ai hano ʻ aonga mo ngalivale ke fakakaukau ki he fehangahangaí. Ka ʻ o kapau ʻ oku fua fakalelei ʻ a e meʻá ni, ʻ e sio ai ʻ oku teʻeki ai ke fakaleleiʻi ʻ a e fehuʻí pea ko ia ai ʻ oku ʻ ikai ha founga ke vakaiʻi ai ʻ a e meʻavaʻingá. Ko e liliu kotoa pe ʻo e feituʻu ʻoku fakatokangaʻi ʻoku totonu ke fai ia, ʻa ia, ki ha ngaue ʻa e meʻa naʻe mamata ki ai pe ko e mamata, pe ko e ngaahi feʻaveʻaki fakatouʻosi. ... Ko ʻeni mei he māmaní ʻoku fakatokangaʻi ʻa e angatuʻu ʻo e ngaahi langí pea ʻoku faʻu ia maʻa hotau matá. Ko ia ai, kapau ʻ oku ʻ ikai ha ngaʻunu ʻ a e māmaní kuo pau ke hoko ʻ a e ngaʻunu ko ení ʻ i he meʻa kotoa pē ʻ i tuʻa ʻ i he māmaní, ka ʻ i he tafaʻaki ʻ e tahá ʻ o kapau ʻ e ngaʻunu ʻ a e meʻa kotoa pē ʻ i he māmaní, pea ko e faʻahinga angatuʻu fakaʻahó ia. Ko ia ʻ oku hā ngali uesia ʻ e he meʻá ni ʻ a e ʻ univēsí kotoa, ʻ a ia, ko e meʻa kotoa pē ʻ i tuʻa ʻ i he māmaní fakataha mo e fakaʻatā pē ʻ e taha ʻ o e māmaní tonu. Kae kehe, kapau ʻ oku totonu ke fakahaaʻi ʻ e ha taha ko e ngaʻunu ko ení naʻe ʻ ikai ko ha meʻa makehe ia ki he langí, ka naʻe vilo ʻ a e māmaní mei he hihifo ki he hahaké, pea kapau naʻe fakakaukauʻi fakalelei eni fekauʻaki mo e hopo hake ʻ a e laʻaá, ko e māhiná mo e ngaahi fetuʻú, ʻ e ʻ iloʻi ai ko e tuʻunga moʻoní eni."
Nikolasi Copernicus, The Revolutions of the Heavenly Bodies, 1543
ʻE lava ke fakaʻaongaʻi ʻa e potufolofola ko ha fakamoʻoni naʻe kehe ʻa Copernicus mei he kau filosefa fakanatula Aristotelian ʻo hono kuonga koeʻuhi he naʻa ne fokotuʻu mai
A.ʻOku spherical ʻa e cosmos
B.ʻOku spherical ʻa e mamani
C.ʻOku geostatic ʻa e cosmos
D.ʻOku ʻikai tuʻu maʻu ʻa e mamani
GivenAnswer:
D. ʻOku ʻikai tuʻu maʻu ʻa e mamani

ʻOku fakamatalaʻi ʻe Copernicus ʻi he potufolofola ko ʻení ʻoku ʻikai tuʻu maʻu ʻa e māmaní ka ʻoku vilo ia mei hihifo ki hahake. ʻOku ne pehē kapau ʻoku vilo ʻa e māmaní, ʻe lava ke fakamatalaʻi ʻa e ngaahi ngaʻunu ʻoku hā mai ʻi he laʻaá, māhiná mo e ngaahi fetuʻú. ʻOku kehe ʻeni mei he fakakaukau Aristotelian naʻe poupouʻi ʻe he tokolahi ʻi hono kuongá ʻo pehē ʻoku tuʻu maʻu ʻa e māmaní ʻi he loto ʻo e ʻunivēsí. Neongo ʻoku ne poupou ki he fakakaukau ʻoku spherical ʻa e cosmos mo e māmaní, ka ʻoku ʻikai ko e ngaahi fakakaukau ko iá ʻoku kehe ai ia mei he kau Aristotelian ka ko ʻene fakakaukau ʻoku ʻikai tuʻu maʻu ʻa e māmaní.

Question:
Mutations ʻoku ne fakatupu achondroplasia ha ola ʻe lava ke fakafaʻahinga ʻo hange ko e:
A.kovi ʻaupito.
B.maʻu e ngaue.
C.haploinsufficiency.
D.mole ʻa e ngaue.
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu ko e C. haploinsufficiency.

ʻOku fakatupu ʻa e achondroplasia ʻe he ngaahi mūtesini ʻi he FGFR3 gene ʻa ia ʻoku ne fakatupu ha haploinsufficiency. Ko e haploinsufficiency ko ha tuʻunga ʻoku ʻikai feʻunga ai ʻa e ʻū gene moʻui ʻe taha ke fakatupu ha fua angamaheni, tupu mei he mole pe liliu ʻa e tatau ʻe taha ʻo e gene. 

ʻI he achondroplasia, ʻoku fakatupu ʻe he mūtesini ha liliu ʻi he ngāue ʻa e protein FGFR3, ʻo ne uesia ai e tupulaki totonu ʻa e hui. Ka neongo ia, ʻoku kei ʻi ai pe ha tatau ʻe taha ʻo e gene ʻoku ngāue lelei, ko ia ʻoku ʻikai ke mole kakato ʻa e ngāue ka ʻoku si'i ange pe ʻa e ola ʻo fakatupunga ai ʻa e haploinsufficiency.

Question:
ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e fehuʻi ko ʻení ki he fakamatala ko ʻení.
"ʻOku tanumaki ʻa e ngaahi tenga ʻo totalitarian regimes ʻe he mamahi mo e fie maʻu. ʻOku nau mafola mo tupulaki ʻi he kelekele kovi ʻo e masivá mo e fekeʻikeʻí. ʻOku nau aʻusia ʻenau tupulaki kakató ʻi he taimi kuo mate ai ha ʻamanaki lelei ʻa ha kakai ki ha moʻui ʻoku lelei angé. Kuo pau ke tau tauhi ʻa e ʻamanaki lelei ko ia ke moʻui. . . . Kuo tuku mai kiate kitautolu ha ngaahi fatongia maʻongoʻonga ʻi he ngaʻunu vave ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hoko. . . . ʻOku ou tui pau ʻe fehangahangai hangatonu ʻa e Falealea mo e ngaahi fatongia ko ʻeni."
Palesiteni Harry S. Truman, 1947
ʻOku fakahaaʻi fakahangatonu ʻe he ngaahi fakakaukau ʻoku fakahaaʻi ʻi he potufolofola ʻi ʻolunga ʻa e ngaahi continuities ko ʻeni ʻi he hisitolia ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti?
A.Fakakikihi fekauʻaki mo e va fetuʻutaki ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e Falealea mo e Palesiteni.
B.Tipeiti fekauʻaki mo hono fakaʻaongaʻi ʻo e kau ngaue fakakautau ʻi he ngaahi tukunga volatile.
C.Tipeiti fekauʻaki mo e fatongia ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ʻo e mamani.
D.Ngaahi fakakikihi fekauʻaki mo e fatongia totonu ʻo e ngaahi faʻahi fakapolitikale.
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu ki he fehuʻi ko ʻeni ko e C. Tipeiti fekauʻaki mo e fatongia ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ʻo e mamani.

ʻOku fakahaaʻi ʻe he potufolofola ʻa e fakakaukau ʻoku ʻi ai ha fatongia mahuʻinga ʻo e ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ʻi he ngaahi meʻa fakamamani lahi, tautautefito ʻi hono taukapoʻi ʻo e ngaahi puleʻanga fakatuʻukimuʻa mei he totalitarianism. ʻOku pehē ʻe Palesiteni Truman kuo tuku mai ki he ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ha "ngaahi fatongia maʻongoʻonga" ʻi he "ngaʻunu vave ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hoko" pea ʻoku ne tui ʻe fehangahangai hangatonu ʻa e Falealea mo e ngaahi fatongia ko ʻeni.

ʻOku ʻikai fakahaaʻi ʻe he potufolofola ni ha fakakikihi pe tipeiti fekauʻaki mo e va fetuʻutaki ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e Falealea mo e Palesiteni, hono fakaʻaongaʻi ʻo e kau ngaue fakakautau, pe ko e ngaahi fatongia ʻo e ngaahi faʻahi fakapolitikale.

Question:
ʻOku fakahaaʻi ʻa e autocorrelation kovi ʻi he taha ʻo e ngaahi meʻa ni?
A.Ko ha sipinga ʻoku toutou hoko ʻi he residuals
B.Ko ha sipinga fetongitongi ʻi he residuals

D.Residuals ʻoku ofi kotoa ki he noa
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu ko e A. Ko ha sipinga ʻoku toutou hoko ʻi he residuals.

ʻOku fakahaaʻi ʻe he autocorrelation kovi ha sipinga ʻoku toutou hoko ʻi he residuals ʻo ha mōtolo fakasitetisitika. ʻOku totonu ke nau hā ʻatā mo taʻefakapotopoto.

ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻeni ʻoku ʻi ai ha fengāueʻaki ʻi he vā ʻo e ngaahi toenga (residuals) ʻo fakafuofuaʻi ʻe he mōtolo. ʻOku totonu ke ʻoua naʻa ʻi ai ha fengāueʻaki, ka ʻoku totonu ke nau ʻatā mo taʻefakapotopoto.

ʻOku ʻikai ko ha fakaʻilonga lelei ʻeni ki he mōtolo he ʻoku ʻikai ke ne fakamatalaʻi kakato ʻa e fengāueʻaki ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ngaahi liliu. ʻE lava ke fakatupu ʻe he autocorrelation kovi ha ngaahi tukuhifo hala ʻo e ngaahi makatuʻunga sitetisitika.

Question:
Fakapapauʻi ʻa e H + (aq) ʻi he 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, founga fakaleleiʻi. (Ko e ka ki he phenol ko e 1 × 10 ^-10.)
A.1 × 10 ^-10 M
B.1 × 10 ^-9 M
C.1 × 10 ^-3 M
D.1 × 10 ^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Ke maʻu ʻa e tali totonú, tau ngāueʻaki ʻa e fōmula pH + pOH = 14 pea mo e fōmula pOH = -log[OH-].

ʻUluakí, tau ʻiloʻi ʻa e Ka (ʻa ia ʻoku ʻomai):
Ka = 1 × 10^-10

Hoko maí, tau maʻu ʻa e [OH-] ʻo ngāueʻaki ʻa e fōmula Kb:
Kb = Ka × Kw / Ka = (1 × 10^-10) × (1 × 10^-14) / (1 × 10^-10) = 1 × 10^-14 / 1 × 10^-10 = 1 × 10^-4

[OH-] = sqrt(Kb × [C6H5OH])
       = sqrt((1 × 10^-4) × (1.0))
       = sqrt(1 × 10^-4)
       = 1 × 10^-2 M

Hoko maí, tau maʻu ʻa e pOH:
pOH = -log[OH-] = -log(1 × 10^-2) = 2

Fakaʻosí, tau maʻu ʻa e pH:
pH + pOH = 14
pH = 14 - pOH = 14 - 2 = 12

ʻI he pH = 12, tau lava ʻo maʻu ʻa e [H+]:
[H+] = 10^-pH = 10^-12 M

Ko ia ai, ko e tali totonú ko e A. 1 × 10^-10 M.

Question:

A.telinga ʻi he K

Ko ia ai, ko e tali totonu taha pē ʻoku ʻuhinga mo ngāue ʻaki ʻi he lea faka-Tonga ko e "ʻi he K" pe "ʻi he taimi kotoa pē".

Question:
ʻOku fakafofongaʻi ʻa e voltage ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai ʻi ha inductor ko e,
A.ola ʻo hono inductance mo e lolotonga ʻ i aí.
B.fika ʻo hono inductance ke lolotonga ʻi ai.
C.fika ʻo e lolotonga ʻo aʻu ki hono inductance.
D.ola ʻo hono inductance mo e vave ʻo e liliu ʻo e lolotonga.
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu ki he fehuʻi ko ʻení ko e D. ʻOku fakafofongaʻi ʻa e voltage ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai ʻi ha inductor ko e ola ʻo hono inductance mo e vave ʻo e liliu ʻo e lolotonga.

ʻOku fakamatalaʻi ʻeni ʻe he Lao Faraday ʻo e Fakaʻaiʻai, ʻa ia ʻoku pehē ko e voltage ʻoku fakatupu ʻi ha seakale ʻoku fakapapauʻi ia ʻe he vave ʻo e liliu ʻi he flux magnetic ʻoku ʻasi atu ʻi he seakale ko iá. ʻI he inductor, ʻoku fakatefito ʻa e flux magnetic ʻi he lolotonga ʻoku tafe ʻi he inductor.

Mathematically, ʻoku fakamatalaʻi ʻeni ʻaki e equation:

V = -L * (di/dt)

ʻOku fakafofongaʻi ʻe he V ʻa e voltage ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai, L ko e inductance, pea ko e di/dt ko e derivative ʻo e lolotonga ʻi he taimi, pe ko e vave ʻo e liliu ʻo e lolotonga.

Ko ia ai, ʻoku tonu ke fili ʻa e tali D, he ʻoku fakamahino ia ko e voltage ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai ʻi ha inductor ʻoku fakapapauʻi ia ʻe he ola ʻo hono inductance mo e vave ʻo e liliu ʻo e lolotonga ʻoku tafe ʻi aí.

Question:
ʻOku ʻi ai ha kia ʻo ha taha faʻa kataki ʻoku ne maumauʻi ʻa e filosiliva ʻi he tuʻunga ʻo e cervical hono ono vertebra.
A.He ʻikai ke nau lava ʻo manava taʻe ʻi ai ha tokoni ki he moʻui.
B.Te nau lava pe ʻo manava fakalongolongo.
C.ʻOku ʻikai lava ke tala ha ola ʻo e manava.
D.ʻE uesia ʻa e manava.
GivenAnswer:
D. ʻE uesia ʻa e manava.

ʻI he taimi ʻoku maumauʻi ai ʻa e filosiliva ʻi he tuʻunga ʻo e cervical hono ono vertebra (C6), ʻe uesia ʻa e manava ʻa e tokotaha. ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi neave ʻoku nau puleʻi ʻa e manava ʻoku nau ʻalu atu mei he ʻutó ʻo fakafou ʻi he filosiliva ʻi he tuʻunga ko ʻení. ʻI he taimi ʻoku maumauʻi ai ʻa e filosiliva, ʻe uesia ʻa e ngaahi neave ko ʻení pea ʻe faingataʻa ke puleʻi ʻa e manava.

Neongo ia, ʻoku ʻikai ʻuhinga ia ʻe ʻikai lava ʻa e tokotaha ke manava pe ʻe fie maʻu ha tokoni ki he moʻui. ʻE kei lava pē ʻa e tokotaha ʻo manava, ka ʻe ʻikai tatau mo e angamaheni. ʻE lava ke hoko ʻa e ngaahi palopalema hangē ko e faingataʻaʻia ʻo e manava, manava māmālie, pe manava taʻe-maʻu.

Ko ia ai, ko e tali totonu taha ki he fehuʻi ko ʻení ko e "D. ʻE uesia ʻa e manava."

Question:
Ko e fallacy ʻo laudatory ʻulungaanga ko ha faʻahinga pau ia ʻo e
A.Ko e fallacy ʻo e fakatuʻutamaki
B.Palopalema loi
C.Kole ʻa e fehuʻi
D.Fakaʻuhinga ʻoku fuopotopoto
GivenAnswer:

Ko e fallacy ʻo e laudatory ʻulungaanga (pe ko e "appeal to flattery" ʻi he lea faka-Pilitānia) ʻoku ʻuhinga ia ki hono fakaʻaongaʻi ʻo e fakamālō pe fakaʻofoʻofa ke tākiekina e fakakaukau ʻa ha taha kae ʻikai ko e ngaahi ʻuhinga moʻoni. 

ʻOku ʻikai ke kaunga ʻeni ki he:
- Fallacy ʻo e fakatuʻutāmaki (A), ʻa ia ʻoku fakaʻaongaʻi e ilifia ke tākiekina e fakakaukau
- Palopalema loi (B), ʻa ia ʻoku faʻu ha fakamatala loi
- Kole ʻa e fehuʻi (C), ʻa ia ʻoku ʻeke ha fehuʻi ʻoku ʻosi ʻi ai e tali ʻoku fiemaʻu.

Ka ʻoku tonu ke fakamatalaʻi ia ko ha faʻahinga ʻo e fakaʻuhinga ʻoku fuopotopoto (D), he ʻoku fakaʻaongaʻi e fakamālō ke fakalotoʻi ha taha ke tali ha tūkuʻanga ʻo fakafou ʻi he ʻai ke nau ongoʻi lelei kau ki ai kae ʻikai ko e ivi ʻo e ngaahi ʻuhinga.

Question:

A.46,295
B.46,504
C.47,520
D.47,924

Tau sivisivi taki taha ʻa e ngaahi fili:

B. 46,504 - ʻOku ofi ange ʻeni ki he 47,000 ʻi he 46,000, ka ʻoku kei siʻi hifo ia ʻi he 47,000. ʻOku ʻikai ko e tali ʻeni.

C. 47,520 - ʻOku ofi ange ʻeni ki he 48,000 ʻi he 47,000, ko ia ʻoku ʻikai ko e tali ʻeni.

ʻI he vakai ki he ngaahi fili, ʻoku ʻikai ha taha ʻoku tali totonu. Ka ʻi he ngaahi fili ʻe 4, ko e tali ofi taha ki he fehuʻi ko e B. 46,504, he ko e fika ia ʻoku ofi taha ki he 47,000.

Question:
Fakafehoanaki mo e ngaahi faʻahi fakapolitikale ʻi he ngaahi fonua hange ko ʻIngilani mo ʻIsileli, ʻa ia ʻoku fakatou ʻi ai multiparty ngaahi polokalama, ʻoku

B.siʻisiʻi ange hono ʻiloʻi ʻi he ngaahi fakakaukau fakapolitikale maʻu pe

GivenAnswer:
ʻI he fehuʻi ko ʻeni, ʻoku tau fakafehoanaki ʻa e ngaahi faʻahi fakapolitikale ʻi he ʻIunaiteti Siteiti ki he ngaahi fonua ʻoku nau maʻu ʻa e ngaahi polokalama fakapolitikale lahi ange ʻo hangē ko ʻIngilani mo ʻIsileli.

ʻOku ou pehē ko e tali totonu taha ko e D: lava lelei ange ke fakafotunga ʻa e ngaahi taumuʻa ʻo ʻenau constituencies kotoa.

ʻI he ngaahi fonua ʻoku nau maʻu ʻa e ngaahi polokalama fakapolitikale lahi ange, ʻoku ʻi ai ha ngaahi faʻahi fakapolitikale lahi ange ʻa ia ʻoku nau fakafotunga ha ngaahi kulupu kehekehe ʻi he sosaieti. ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻeni ʻoku ʻi ai ha faingamālie lahi ange ki he kau pōti ke kumi ha faʻahi ʻoku fenāpasi mo ʻenau ngaahi tui fakapolitikale.

ʻI he tafaʻaki ʻe taha, ʻi he ʻIunaiteti Siteiti, ʻoku ʻi ai pe ʻa e ongo faʻahi lalahi ʻe ua ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai ke na maʻu ha fakafotunga ʻo e kakai kotoa. ʻOku faingataʻa ange ai ki he kau pōti ke kumi ha faʻahi ʻoku nau loto ki ai.

Ko ia ai, ʻoku ou pehē ʻoku sai ange ʻa e ngaahi polokalama fakapolitikale lahi ʻi hono fakafotunga ʻo e kakai kotoa ʻi he fonua.

Question:
Ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ni ʻoku ne fakapapauʻi ʻa e noa pee relatedness ʻo e faʻahinga kehekehe ʻo makatuʻunga ʻi he fakahokohoko ʻo e ʻesiti ʻamino homologous polotini ʻoku siʻisiʻi ange ʻene tonu ʻi he loto fakapapau ʻo e relatedness ʻo makatuʻunga ʻi he nucleotide sequences ʻo homologous afa?

GivenAnswer:

Ko ia, ʻoku nau fakatupu ha faikehekehe ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e loto fakapapau ʻo e relatedness ʻo makatuʻunga ʻi he fakahokohoko ʻo e ʻesiti ʻamino mo e fakahokohoko ʻo e nucleotide.

2. ʻOku ʻikai ke fakatupu ʻe he sini duplications mo e translocations ha liliu ʻi he fakahokohoko ʻo e ʻesiti ʻamino pe ko e fakahokohoko ʻo e nucleotide, ka ʻoku nau liliu ʻa e lahi mo e tuʻuʻanga ʻo e ngaahi sini.

3. ʻOku fakatupu ʻe he kolosi ʻi he ha liliu ʻi he fakahokohoko ʻo e ʻesiti ʻamino pea mo e fakahokohoko ʻo e nucleotide, ka ʻoku ʻikai ke ne fakatupu ha faikehekehe ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ongo loto fakapapau ʻo e relatedness.

Ko ia, ko e miuteisoni fakalongolongo pe ʻoku ne fakapapauʻi ʻa e noa pee relatedness ʻo e faʻahinga kehekehe ʻo makatuʻunga ʻi he fakahokohoko ʻo e ʻesiti ʻamino homologous polotini ʻoku siʻisiʻi ange ʻene tonu ʻi he loto fakapapau ʻo e relatedness ʻo makatuʻunga ʻi he nucleotide sequences ʻo homologous afa.

Question:

Question:
Kumi ʻa e $-\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot\cfrac{1}{~ \frac{1}{-3} ~}. $
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:

Ko e tali totonu ko e "Globalisation". ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻa e globalisation ki he founga ʻoku fehokotaki ai ʻa e ngaahi fonua ʻo e māmaní ʻi he tafaʻaki fakasōsiale, fakaʻekonōmika, fakapolitikale mo e fakafonua. ʻOku kau ʻi he globalisation ʻa e tupulaki ʻi he fefakatauʻaki fakavahaʻapuleʻanga, fetuʻutaki, mo e feʻaveʻaki ʻo e ngaahi fakakaukau mo e ʻulungāanga fakafonua.

ʻI he taimi ʻoku hoko ai ʻa e globalisation, ʻoku lava ke tākiekina ʻe he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hoko ʻi he fonua ʻe taha ʻa e ngaahi fonua kehe. Hangē ko ʻení, kapau ʻoku holo ʻa e tuʻunga faka-ʻekonōmika ʻi he fonua ʻe taha, ʻe lava ke uesia ai ʻa e ngaahi fonua ʻoku nau fefakatauʻaki mo e fonua ko iá. Ko ia ai, ko e globalisation ʻoku ne fakamatalaʻi lelei taha ʻa e founga ʻoku fehokotaki ai ʻa e ngaahi fonua ʻo māmani ʻo lava ai ke tākiekina ʻe he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hoko ʻi he fonua ʻe taha ʻa e ngaahi fonua kehé.

Question:

GivenAnswer:

ʻOku ʻomi ʻe he ngaahi credits tukuhau ha ngaahi fakamaʻamaʻa tukuhau ki he kau tukuhau, ʻo fakatupu ai ha fakamaʻamaʻa ʻi he ngaahi totongi tukuhau ʻa e kau tukuhau. ʻE lava ke tokoni ʻeni ke fakalahi e paʻanga ʻoku maʻu ʻe he kau tukuhau ke fakamoleki pe fai ha ngaahi investimeni, ʻa ia te ne lava ʻo fakatupu ha tupulaki fakaʻekonōmika. 

ʻI he tafaʻaki ʻe taha, ʻoku ʻikai ke ngalingali ʻe fakatupu ʻe he fakaʻauha lahi ange ʻo e ngaahi maʻuʻanga tokoni fakanatula (A) pe lahi ange e taʻeʻilo ʻa e kakai lalahi (B) ha tupulaki fakaʻekonōmika malohi ange. Ko ia ai, ʻoku hā mahino mai ko e tali lelei taha ko e credits tukuhau (D) ʻi hono fakatupu ha tupulaki fakaʻekonōmika malohi ange ʻi ha vahaʻataimi.

Question:
Ko e foʻi moʻoni ko ia ko e infrared absorption tuʻo lahi ʻo e deuterium chloride (DCl) ʻoku liliu ia mei he fakapaaki ʻo e chloride (HCl) ʻoku tupu ia mei he ngaahi faikehekehe ʻi heʻenau
A.electron tufakiʻanga naunau
B.momeniti dipole
C.fakamalohiʻi maʻu pe
D.fakasiʻisiʻi e lahi
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu ki he fehuʻi ko ʻeni ko e B. momeniti dipole.

ʻOku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi ʻuhinga ko ʻeni:

1. ʻOku tatau pē ʻa e fōtunga fakamolekiula ʻo e HCl mo e DCl, ko ia ʻoku ʻikai ke nau faikehekehe ʻi heʻenau electron tufakiʻanga naunau (A).

2. ʻOku ʻikai tatau ʻa e mamafa ʻo e hydrogen (H) mo e deuterium (D), ka ʻoku tatau pē ʻa e lahi ʻo e ʻelekituloni ʻi he ongo ʻatomi. Ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai uesia ʻe he liliu ko ʻeni ʻa e fakamalohiʻi maʻu pe (C) pe fakasiʻisiʻi e lahi (D) ʻo e HCl mo e DCl.

3. Ka neongo ia, koeʻuhī ko e mamafa ange ʻa e deuterium ʻi he hydrogen, ʻoku liliu ai ʻa e momeniti dipole (B) ʻo e molekiula. ʻOku ola ʻeni ʻi he ngaahi faikehekehe ʻi he ngaahi foʻi moʻoni infrared absorption ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e HCl mo e DCl.

Ko ia, ko e momeniti dipole (B) ʻa e ʻuhinga totonu ki he faikehekehe ʻi he infrared absorption ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e HCl mo e DCl.

Question:
Ko e 0.1 ʻa e lavameʻa ʻa ha photon MONOKISAITI. Kapau ʻoku ʻave ʻa e photons ʻe 100 ki he MONOKISAITI, ʻe ʻiloʻi ʻe he MONOKISAITI ʻa e photons
A.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 4
B.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 3
C.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e taʻu 1
D.ko e ʻavalisi ʻo e tuʻo 10, mo ha rms ʻo e 0.1
GivenAnswer:
Ke maʻu ʻa e tali totonu, tau fakakaukau ki he tefitoʻi moʻoni ʻo e lavameʻa ʻo e photon detection.

1. ʻOku ʻomai ʻe he fehuʻi ko e lavameʻa ʻo e photon detection ʻa e 0.1. ʻOku ʻuhinga eni ʻoku ʻi ai ha faingamālie ʻe 10% ke ʻiloʻi ʻe he MONOKISAITI ha photon ʻe taha.

2. ʻOku ʻomai foki ʻe he fehuʻi ʻoku ʻave ʻa e photons ʻe 100 ki he MONOKISAITI.

3. ʻI he tuʻunga ko ʻeni, ʻe muimui ʻa e fika ʻo e photons kuo ʻiloʻi ki he Poisson distribution pea ʻe tatau ʻa e ʻavalisi mo e variance.

4. ʻE tatau ʻa e ʻavalisi ʻo e photons kuo ʻiloʻi mo e 100 (fika ʻo e photons) × 0.1 (lavameʻa) = 10.

5. Ko e rms (root mean square) deviation ko e sikuea ruti ia ʻo e variance. ʻI he Poisson distribution, ʻoku tatau ʻa e variance mo e ʻavalisi, ko ia ai ko e rms deviation ko e √10 ≈ 3.16.

Ko ia ai, ko e tali totonu ko e B. ʻE ʻiloʻi ʻe he MONOKISAITI ha ʻavalisi ʻo e photons ʻe 10, pea mo ha rms deviation ʻo e 3.

Question:
ʻOku ngalingali ʻe ʻoatu ha tukuhau ʻi ha kautaha fakatau koloa ki he koloa ʻi he founga ʻo e totongi ʻo kapau
A.totongi fano afo ʻo e fie maʻu ʻoku ʻai takai fano lahi.
B.totongi fano afo ʻo e fie maʻu ʻoku fuʻu inelastic.

D.ʻOku ʻai takai fano afo lahi ʻa e fie maʻu.

ʻI he taimi ʻoku inelastic ai ʻa e fie maʻu, ʻoku ʻikai ke fuʻu liliu lahi ʻa e lahi ʻo e fie maʻu ʻi he taimi ʻoku liliu ai ʻa e totongi. ʻI he tuʻunga ko ʻení, ʻe lava ʻe he kautaha fakatau koloa ʻo hiki hake ʻa e totongi ʻo e koloa ʻaki hono ʻai ʻo e tukuhau pea ʻe kei hokohoko atu pē ʻa e tokolahi taha ʻo e kau fakatau ke fakatau ʻa e koloa. Ko ia ai, ʻe totongi ʻe he kau fakatau ha konga lahi ʻo e tukuhau.

ʻI he tafaʻaki ʻe tahá, kapau ʻoku ʻai takai fano lahi ʻa e fie maʻu (A), ʻe holo lahi ʻa e fie maʻu ʻi he hiki ʻa e totongi pea ʻe faingataʻa ange ki he kautaha ke ʻai ʻa e tukuhau ki he kau fakatau. ʻOku ʻikai ko ha tali ʻaonga ʻa e C mo e D ki he fehuʻí ni.

Question:
Kumi ʻa e loloa ʻo e Pikoʻanga y = laine x ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ngaahi poini ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e y = 1/2 mo e y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Ke maʻu ʻa e loloa ʻo e Pikoʻanga y = laine x ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ongo poini ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e y = 1/2 mo e y = 1, tau ngāueʻaki ʻa e fōmula ko ʻeni:

Loloa = ∫(y₂, y₁) √(1 + (dy/dx)²) dx

ʻI heni, dy/dx ko e tuʻunga ʻuluaki ʻo e y = laine x, ʻa ia ko e laine. Ko ia ai, dy/dx = laine.

Loloa = ∫(1, 1/2) √(1 + laine²) dx

Fakamolemoleʻi ʻa e √(1 + laine²) ʻaki hono ui ko e u. Pea, dx = du / laine.

Loloa = (1/laine) ∫(√(1 + laine²), √(1 + (laine/2)²)) u du

Loloa = (1/laine) [u²/2] (√(1 + laine²), √(1 + (laine/2)²))

Loloa = (1/laine) (1/2) [(1 + laine²) - (1 + (laine²/4))]

Loloa = (1/laine) (1/2) [laine² - (laine²/4)]

Loloa = (1/laine) (1/2) [(3laine²)/4]

Loloa = (3laine)/8

Ko ia ai, ko e tali totonu ko e B. 0.86

Question:

Question:

Question:
Ko e fononga ʻi he ʻuluaki vave ʻo e 1.5 × 10 ^ 6 m/s, ʻoku hu ha proton ki ha feituʻu ʻo e hiki fakamakinito ʻo e lahi ʻo e 1.5 T. Kapau ʻoku hanga ʻe he ʻuluaki malohi vector ʻa e proton ʻo ʻai ha tuliki ʻe 30 ° mo e feituʻu hiki fakamakinito, compute e vave ʻo e proton 4 s hili ʻene hu ki he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito.
A.5.0 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
B.7.5 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10 ^ 6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Ke maʻu e tali totonu, tau muimui ʻi he ngaahi sitepu ko ʻeni:

1. ʻUluaki, tau kumi e malohi ʻoku ngāue ki he proton. ʻOku tau ʻilo ko e malohi Lorentz F = qvB sin(θ), ʻa ia ko e q ko e ʻūniti ʻo e proton, v ko e vave ʻo e proton, B ko e hiki fakamakinito, pea ko e θ ko e tuliki ʻi he vaha'a ʻo e vave mo e hiki fakamakinito.

   q = 1.6 × 10^-19 C
   v = 1.5 × 10^6 m/s
   B = 1.5 T
   θ = 30°

   F = (1.6 × 10^-19 C) × (1.5 × 10^6 m/s) × (1.5 T) × sin(30°)
     = 1.2 × 10^-13 N

2. Hili ia, tau kumi e takai radius ʻo e proton ʻi he feituʻu hiki fakamakinito. ʻOku tau ʻilo ko e r = mv / (qB sin(θ)), ʻa ia ko e m ko e mamafa ʻo e proton.

   m = 1.67 × 10^-27 kg

   r = (1.67 × 10^-27 kg) × (1.5 × 10^6 m/s) / ((1.6 × 10^-19 C) × (1.5 T) × sin(30°))
     = 1.04 × 10^-2 m

3. Ko e taimi ʻe 4 s, ʻe takai tuʻo lahi ʻa e proton. Tau kumi e fuo ʻo e tuliki ʻaki e fōmula ω = v / r.

   ω = (1.5 × 10^6 m/s) / (1.04 × 10^-2 m)
     = 1.44 × 10^8 rad/s

   Tuliki hili ʻa e 4 s = (1.44 × 10^8 rad/s) × (4 s) = 5.76 × 10^8 rad

4. Fakaʻosi, ʻoku tau ʻilo ko e vave ʻo e proton ʻoku ʻikai liliu, ko ia ai, hili ʻa e 4 s, ʻe tatau pē ʻa e vave mo e 1.5 × 10^6 m/s.

Ko ia ai, ko e tali totonu ko e C. 1.5 × 10^6 m/s.

Question:
ʻOku fuʻu tolalo fakaʻekonomika ʻa e tuʻunga fakaʻekonomika. ʻI he tuʻunga fakaʻekonomika ko ʻeni, ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi fakamatala ko ʻeni fekauʻaki mo e tuʻutuʻuni fakapaʻanga ʻoku tonu?
A.ʻE toe kovi ange ʻa e tuʻutuʻuni expansionary ʻi he tolalo fakaʻekonomika.
B.ʻOku fakatupulaki lahi ʻe he tuʻutuʻuni Expansionary aggregate fie maʻu kapau ʻoku ongoʻingofua ʻa e ngaahi liliu ʻi he vave ʻo e tokanga.
C.Ko e tuʻutuʻuni Contractionary ko e Stimulus totonu ia ki he tokateu mo e fakaʻauha.
D.Kapau ʻoku lelei ʻaupito ʻa e fie maʻu ʻo e paʻanga ʻai takai fano expansionary tuʻutuʻuni fakapaʻanga.
GivenAnswer:
ʻOku tonu ʻa e tali D. ʻI he taimi ʻoku tolalo ai ʻa e tuʻunga fakaʻekonomika, ʻoku totonu ke ngāueʻaki ʻe he kau faʻu tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e tuʻutuʻuni fakapaʻanga expansionary ke fakalahi ʻa e fie maʻu fakalukufua pea fakaakeake ʻa e tuʻunga fakaʻekonomika. ʻOku kau ʻi he ngaahi founga ʻo e tuʻutuʻuni fakapaʻanga expansionary ʻa hono holoki ʻo e ngaahi totongi tupu, fakatau ʻo e ngaahi koloa fakapaʻanga ʻe he pangikē senisolo, mo hono holoki ʻo e ngaahi fiemaʻu ʻa e pangikē kuo pau ke tauhi ʻe he ngaahi pangikē fakakomēsiale. ʻOku tokoni ʻa e ngaahi ngāue ko ʻeni ke fakalahi ʻa e paʻanga ʻoku ʻatā ki he kakai fakafoʻituitui mo e ngaahi pisinisi ke fakamoleki, ʻo ola ai ha fakalahi ʻi he fie maʻu fakalukufua.

ʻOku hala ʻa e tali A he ʻoku ʻikai ke kovi ange ʻa e tuʻutuʻuni expansionary ʻi he lolotonga ʻo e tolalo fakaʻekonomika; ko hono moʻoni, ʻoku tokoni ia ke fakaakeake ʻa e tuʻunga fakaʻekonomika.

ʻOku hala ʻa e tali B he ʻoku ʻikai maʻu ʻe he tuʻutuʻuni expansionary ha ola lahi ange ʻi he fie maʻu fakalukufua ʻi he taimi ʻoku ongoʻingofua ai ʻa e ngaahi liliu ʻi he vave ʻo e tokanga.

ʻOku hala ʻa e tali C he ko e tuʻutuʻuni contractionary ʻoku fakangatangata ia ʻi he fie maʻu fakalukufua pea ʻe fakalahi ʻa e tolalo fakaʻekonomika, kae ʻikai ko ha meʻa totonu ia ki he tokateu mo e fakaʻauha.

Question:
ʻI he vakapuna XY, ko e kalafi ʻo e x ^ (log y) = y ^ log x
A.ʻa e ʻuluaki quadrant
B.ko ha Pikoʻanga kuo tapuni
C.ko ha huelo ʻi he ʻuluaki quadrant
D.ko ha foʻi poini pe ʻe taha
GivenAnswer:
Ke maʻu ʻa e tali totonu, tau sivisivi ʻa e kalafi ʻo e x^(log y) = y^(log x) ʻi he vakapuna XY.

1) ʻUluaki, tau liliu ʻa e equation ke maʻu ha fōtunga ʻoku faingofua ange hono sivisivi:

   x^(log y) = y^(log x)
   log(x^(log y)) = log(y^(log x))
   (log y)(log x) = (log x)(log y)

   ʻOku tau sio ʻoku moʻoni ʻa e equation ki he ngaahi mahuʻinga kotoa pē ʻo e x mo e y ʻoku lahi ange ʻi he 0, he ko e logarithm ʻoku ʻikai fakamahuʻingaʻi ia ki he 0 pe ngaahi fika iiki ange.

2) Hili ia, tau vakai ki he ngaahi mahuʻinga fakangatangata ʻo e x mo e y:

   - Kapau x → 0⁺, pea y → 0⁺.
   - Kapau x → ∞, pea y → ∞.
   - Kapau y → 0⁺, pea x → 0⁺.
   - Kapau y → ∞, pea x → ∞.

   ʻOku ʻuhinga ʻeni ʻoku kamata mo ngata ʻa e kalafi ʻi he (0,0) pea ʻalu taʻengata ki he (∞,∞).

3) Fēfē ʻa e anga ʻo e kalafi ʻi he vahaʻa ʻo e ongo ngataʻanga ko ʻení? ʻOku tau ʻilo ʻoku hā ʻa e equation ʻi he ʻuluaki quadrant kotoa, koeʻuhí he ʻoku pau ke lahi ange ʻi he 0 ʻa e x mo e y ke ʻaonga ʻa e logarithm.

4) Fakaʻosi, ʻoku tau lava ʻo fakapapauʻi ʻoku hoko ʻa e kalafi ko ha foʻi laine ʻi he ʻuluaki quadrant ʻaki hano liliu ʻo e equation ki he fōtunga y = x. ʻE lava ke fai ʻeni ʻaki hano hiki hake ʻa e ongo tafaʻaki ʻo e equation ki he 10:

   10^((log y)(log x)) = 10^((log x)(log y))
   y = x

Ko ia ai, ko e tali totonu ko e C. Ko e kalafi ʻo e x^(log y) = y^(log x) ko ha laine ʻi he ʻuluaki quadrant.

Question:
Ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ni ʻoku moʻoni ʻi he hypothyroidism?
A.Mole ʻa e mamafa
B.Tomuʻa tibial myxoedema
C.Ko ha tuʻunga TSH

GivenAnswer:
Ko e ngaahi tali moʻoni ki he fehuʻi ko ʻeni ʻo kau ki he hypothyroidism ko e:

C. Ko ha tuʻunga TSH (Thyroid Stimulating Hormone) maʻolunga

ʻI he hypothyroidism, ʻoku ʻikai ngāue lelei e kilani foʻi ʻakau pea ʻoku siʻi ʻa e fakatupu ʻo e ngaahi homouni thyroxine (T4) mo e triiodothyronine (T3). Ko ia ai, ko e tuʻunga TSH maʻolunga ko ha fakaʻilonga mahuʻinga ia ʻo e hypothyroidism.

Koeʻuhi ko e siʻisiʻi ʻa e ngaahi homouni thyroid, ʻoku hoko ai e ngaahi fakaʻilonga hangē ko e ʻikai saiʻia ʻi he mafana (aversion ki he mafana), ʻa ia ʻoku ongoʻi momoko maʻu pē ʻa e tokotaha.

Ka neongo ia, ʻoku ʻikai ko ha fakaʻilonga angamaheni ʻo e hypothyroidism ʻa e mole mamafa (A) pe ko e tomuʻa tibial myxoedema (B). ʻOku ʻikai hoko maʻu pē ʻa e ongo fakaʻilonga ko ʻeni pea ʻoku ʻikai mahuʻinga ki hono fua pe fakapapauʻi ʻo e hypothyroidism.

ʻI he teori ʻa Herzberg, ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ongo faʻahinga ʻe ua ʻo e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku uesia ʻa e fakaʻaiʻai ʻa e kau ngaue:

1. Ngaahi meʻa fakafiemalie (hygiene factors) - hangē ko e vahenga, tuʻunga ngaue, mo e vā fakasosiale. ʻE lava ke fakafiemālieʻi ʻe he ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni ʻa e kau ngaue ka ʻe ʻikai lava ke fakatupu fakaʻaiʻai.

2. Ngaahi meʻa fakatupu fakaʻaiʻai (motivators) - hangē ko e fakaʻilonga ʻo e lavameʻa, fatongia, mo e faingamālie ke tupulaki. ʻOku fakatupu ʻe he ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni ʻa e fakaʻaiʻai moʻoni.

ʻOku ʻikai ke fakatupu ʻe he ngaahi fili A, C mo D ha fakaʻaiʻai moʻoni he ʻoku nau feʻunga mo e ngaahi meʻa fakafiemālie. Ko e fili B ʻoku fekauʻaki ia mo hono ʻoange ha ngaue ʻoku faingataʻa mo fakatupu ongoʻi lavameʻa, ʻa ia ʻoku hā ko ha meʻa fakatupu fakaʻaiʻai moʻoni ia ʻo fakatatau ki he teori ʻa Herzberg. Ko ia, ko e fili B ʻa e tali totonu.

Question:
ʻOku haʻu ha fefine taʻu 54 ki he ʻofisi koeʻuhi he naʻa ne toutou oloʻi ʻa e mamahi ʻi hono kouʻahe toʻomataʻu mo hono kaungao lolotonga e uike ʻe 3 kuo hili. ʻOku tolonga ʻa e tukunga takitaha ʻo e mamahi ʻi ha sekoni ʻe 1 pe siʻi ange. ʻOku faʻa fakatupu ʻa e mama ʻe he ʻea momoko, mama, ala ʻoku fakaʻaiʻai, mo fulunifo hono nifo. Naʻe ʻikai haʻane lavea ki he mata pe ʻulu. ʻOku fakaofo ʻa e hisitolia fakafaitoʻo ki he langa ʻulu, obesity, mo e tafa gastric. ʻOku ne senitimita ʻe 165 (5 FT 5 ʻi he) maʻolunga pea kilo ʻe 62 (137 lb); KO E BMI ko e kilo ʻe 23/m2. ʻOku angamaheni ʻaki pe ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga mahuʻinga. He ʻikai lava ʻe he mahaki ʻo katakiʻi ʻa e ala ki he tafaʻaki toʻomataʻu ʻo e mata. ʻOku ʻikai ha vaivai pe mole ʻa e ongo. ʻOku ʻikai ha abnormalities ʻi he toenga ʻo e sivi fakatuʻasino. CT scan ʻo e ʻulu pea ʻikai ha fakafehoanaki ʻoku ʻikai ha abnormalities. Ko e fe ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ni ko e pharmacotherapy lelei taha ia ʻi he taimi ko ʻeni?
A.Carbamazepine
B.Lamotrigine
C.Levetiracetam
D.Topiramate
GivenAnswer:
Ko e tali totonu taha ki he fehuʻi ko ʻeni ko e D. Topiramate.

ʻOku hā mai ʻa e fefine ko ʻeni ʻoku ne maʻu ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga ʻo e trigeminal neuralgia, ʻa ia ko ha tuʻunga mamahi lahi ʻoku uesia ai ʻa e nerve trigeminal. ʻOku kau ʻi he ngaahi fakaʻilonga angamaheni ʻo e trigeminal neuralgia ʻa e:

1. Ngaahi tukunga ʻo e mamahi lahi, ʻoku faʻa tolonga ʻi ha sekoni ʻe 1 pe siʻi ange
2. Mamahi ʻoku fakatupu ʻe he ʻea momoko, mama, ala, pe fulunifo hono nifo
3. Mamahi ʻoku fakangatangata ki he tafaʻaki ʻe taha ʻo e mata (ʻi he meʻa ko ʻeni, ko e tafaʻaki toʻomataʻu)

ʻI he ngaahi faito'o ʻoku lisi atu, ko e topiramate ʻoku ngāue lelei taha ia ki hono fakaleleiʻi ʻo e trigeminal neuralgia. Ko ha faito'o anticonvulsant ia ʻoku ngāue ʻaki ʻi he fuofua laine ʻo e faito'o ki he trigeminal neuralgia, pea ʻoku faʻa paotoloaki ia ʻi he ngaahi tuʻunga ko ʻeni koeʻuhi ko ʻene ola lelei mo e ngaahi nunu siʻisiʻi.

Neongo ʻe lava foki ʻo ngāue ʻaki ʻa e carbamazepine mo e lamotrigine ki he trigeminal neuralgia, ʻoku ʻikai ke na angamaheni ʻo hangē ko e topiramate. ʻOku ʻikai angamaheni hono ngāue ʻaki ʻo e levetiracetam ki he trigeminal neuralgia.
